summary: Completed comprehensive testing of refactored Options Scanner application. Backend modular structure (routes/, models/, services/) working perfectly with all 63 API endpoints passing. Frontend utilities extracted to utils/ folder functioning correctly. All core features verified: quote API, options expirations, options chain, iron condors, straddles, symbol switching, collapsible sections, and price chart display.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about chart width/height (-1) dimensions
design_issues.details: Cosmetic console warnings that don't affect functionality

passed_tests: Backend API connectivity test (63/63 endpoints passed)
Modular backend structure - all routes working correctly
Quote API: GET /api/quote?symbol=AAPL returns correct data
Options expirations API: GET /api/options/expirations?symbol=^SPX works
Options chain API: GET /api/options/chain?symbol=^SPX&expiration={date} works
Iron condors API: GET /api/iron-condors?symbol=^SPX&expiration={date} works
Straddles API: GET /api/straddles?symbol=^SPX&expiration={date} works
Frontend main page loads correctly with price chart
Symbol dropdown works - successfully switched from SPY to AAPL
Symbol input field accepts custom symbols (tested AAPL)
Price data updates correctly when symbol changes (SPY: $690.31, AAPL: $273.40)
Historical chart updates with new symbol data
Options chain section displays correct symbol (Options Chain (AAPL))
Options chain table displays data correctly (57 calls, 49 puts for AAPL)
Collapsible sections work (Iron Condors, Straddles expand/collapse)
Navigation between tabs working (6 tabs found and tested)
Auto-refresh dropdown functional
All price metrics update correctly (Open, Day High, Day Low, Previous Close)
Backwards compatibility maintained - legacy /spx/* endpoints still work
Frontend utilities in utils/ folder working (calculations.js, exportUtils.js, constants.js)
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (63/63 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all refactored features working)
